alert.note: Alert for Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 4:00PM CST until January 12 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Russell County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 430 PM CST. * At 400 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Russell County Sports Complex, or 12 miles southwest of Phenix City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Russell County Sports Complex, Seale, Uchee Creek, Fort Mitchell, Fort Mitchell Activity Center, Phenix Drag Strip and Parkmanville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
